title: Left over PROJECT material
body:
Uhh so I guess I was just wondering if there's going to be any purpose to the left over material from the PROJECT event. Currently I still have 2 Augmented Cache shards, the Ekko Icon blueprint and the PROJECT: Yi skin blueprint..

Any ideas would be helpful.

replies.body:
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/E2ArVn9s-event-ended-project-holy-shit-theres-a-lot-going-on-lets-break-this-down

"Update!

The Project event has officially ended for all regions! In patch 6.17, we will be allow players to disenchant their left over Project Materials for orange essesnce.

Unfortunately, I don't know how much orange essence the materials will be worth just yet.

I'll make sure to keep everyone posted!"




"Aug 24th Update

While Patch 6.17 was launched, there was a problem deploying the "recipe" as it were to disenchant the old Project Content. We're looking to get this fixed ASAP, and hopefully will have it resolved by the end of the week.

As soon as I learn more I'll post it here!"

> [{quoted}](name=Monkey D Luffy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ttg8s6Zj,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-08-25T11:42:28.866+0000)
>
> http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/E2ArVn9s-event-ended-project-holy-shit-theres-a-lot-going-on-lets-break-this-down
> 
> "Update!
> 
> The Project event has officially ended for all regions! In patch 6.17, we will be allow players to disenchant their left over Project Materials for orange essesnce.
> 
> Unfortunately, I don't know how much orange essence the materials will be worth just yet.
> 
> I'll make sure to keep everyone posted!"
> 
> 
> 
> 
> "Aug 24th Update
> 
> While Patch 6.17 was launched, there was a problem deploying the "recipe" as it were to disenchant the old Project Content. We're looking to get this fixed ASAP, and hopefully will have it resolved by the end of the week.
> 
> As soon as I learn more I'll post it here!"

Thanks for this!
I have 64 project cores still.... kinda feeling like i didn't capitalize on that event somehow

> [{quoted}](name=Sloth Almighty,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ttg8s6Zj,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-25T09:35:52.764+0000)
>
> I have 64 project cores still.... kinda feeling like i didn't capitalize on that event somehow

You have so many still haha.

Yeah I didn't really want the project skins, just the double (sometimes triple) packed crates. Never bothered with the cores.
Cashing them in for some orange essence would be cool though :)
